content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel insecure about my life. Everyone is an enemy to me.
I understand completely why you feel insecure about things. It' s because everyone is an enemy to you, right? I' ve been there myself.
Can you tell me how were you feeling about this?
I' ve been there myself. It' s very easy to feel bad about things, especially when we' re in a bad place.
